Movie_title: The Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers
Stars: ['Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom']
Scenario: ["While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard."]

Stars: ["Duane Jones, Judith O'Dea, Karl Hardman, Marilyn Eastman"]
Scenario: ['A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.']

Stars: ['Heather Langenkamp, Robert Englund, Jf Davis, Miko Hughes']
Scenario: ['A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?']

Stars: ['Rafe Spall, Arsher Ali, Robert James-Collier, Sam Troughton']
Scenario: ['A group of old college friends reunite for a trip to a forest in Sweden, Northern Europe, but encounter a menacing presence there stalking them.']

Stars: ['Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage, Ed Harris, John Spencer']
Scenario: ['A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.']

Stars: ['Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Dakota Fanning, Radha Mitchell']
Scenario: ['In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.']

Stars: ['Adam Sandler, Julia Fox, Idina Menzel, Mesfin Lamengo']
Scenario: ['With his debts mounting and angry collectors closing in, a fast-talking New York City jeweler risks everything in hope of staying afloat and alive.']

Stars: ['Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif, Katherine Heigl, Nick Stabile']
Scenario: ['Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.']

Stars: ['Sean Biggerstaff, Emilia Fox, Michelle Ryan, Erica Ellis']
Scenario: ['After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.']

Stars: ['Mark Wahlberg, Julianne Moore, Burt Reynolds, Luis Guzmán']
Scenario: ['Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.']

Stars: ['Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins']
Scenario: ['In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.']

Stars: ['Tom Hanks, Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Madonna']
Scenario: ['Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.']

Stars: ['Jennifer Lawrence, Joel Edgerton, Matthias Schoenaerts, Charlotte Rampling']
Scenario: ["Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations."]

Stars: ['Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick']
Scenario: ['A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son John from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.']

Stars: ['Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter']
Scenario: ['After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.']

Stars: ['Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Stephen Graham, Vinnie Jones']
Scenario: ['Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.']

Movie_title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
Stars: ['Barry G. Bernson, Herb Caillouet, Bill Camp, Raffey Cassidy']
Scenario: ['Steven, a charismatic surgeon, is forced to make an unthinkable sacrifice after his life starts to fall apart, when the behavior of a teenage boy he has taken under his wing turns sinister.']

Movie_title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Stars: ['Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffrè']
Scenario: ['A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.']

Stars: ['Andy Samberg, Cristin Milioti, J.K. Simmons, Peter Gallagher']
Scenario: ['Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.']

Stars: ['Zachary Levi, Mark Strong, Asher Angel, Jack Dylan Grazer']
Scenario: ['A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.']

Stars: ['Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Rosemarie DeWitt, J.K. Simmons']
Scenario: ['While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.']

Stars: ['Richard Gere, Julia Roberts, Jason Alexander, Laura San Giacomo']
Scenario: ['A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.']

Stars: ['Adam Sandler, Jennifer Aniston, Brooklyn Decker, Nicole Kidman']
Scenario: ['On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.']

Movie_title: Sweeney Todd - The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
Stars: ['Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Alan Rickman, Timothy Spall']
Scenario: ['The legendary tale of a barber who returns from wrongful imprisonment to 1840s London, bent on revenge for the rape and death of his wife, and resumes his trade while forming a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.']

Stars: ['Ryan Reynolds, Mélanie Laurent, Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Ben Hardy']
Scenario: ['Six individuals from all around the globe, each the very best at what they do, have been chosen not only for their skill, but for a unique desire to delete their pasts to change the future.']

Stars: ['Julie Harris, Claire Bloom, Richard Johnson, Russ Tamblyn']
Scenario: ['Hill House has stood for about 90 years and appears haunted: its inhabitants have always met strange, tragic ends. Now Dr. John Markway has assembled a team of people who he thinks will prove whether or not the house is haunted.']

Stars: ['Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney']
Scenario: ["A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room."]

Stars: ['Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, John Goodman, Alan Arkin']
Scenario: ['Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.']

Stars: ['Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Sienna Miller, Ian McKellen']
Scenario: ["In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm."]

Stars: ['Gina Philips, Justin Long, Jonathan Breck, Patricia Belcher']
Scenario: ['A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree.']

Stars: ['Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson, Hayley Atwell']
Scenario: ['Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.']

Stars: ['David Thewlis, Marlon Brando, Val Kilmer, Fairuza Balk']
Scenario: ['After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.']

Stars: ['Joaquin Phoenix, Amy Adams, Scarlett Johansson, Rooney Mara']
Scenario: ['In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.']

Directors: ['Directors: Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Mervyn LeRoy, Norman Taurog, Richard Thorpe, King Vidor ']
Stars: ['Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger, Bert Lahr']
Scenario: ["Young Dorothy Gale and her dog are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes."]

Stars: ['James Badge Dale, Marin Ireland, Sasha Frolova, Samantha Logan']
Scenario: ['On the trail of a missing girl, an ex-cop comes across a secretive group attempting to summon a terrifying supernatural entity.']

Stars: ['Jason Statham, Bingbing Li, Rainn Wilson, Cliff Curtis']
Scenario: ['A group of scientists exploring the Marianas Trench encounter the largest marine predator that has ever existed - the Megalodon.']

Stars: ['Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Simon Pegg, Leonard Nimoy']
Scenario: ["The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time."]

Movie_title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
Stars: ['Bill Murray, Owen Wilson, Anjelica Huston, Cate Blanchett']
Scenario: ['With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.']

Stars: ['Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali, Linda Cardellini, Sebastian Maniscalco']
Scenario: ['A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.']

Stars: ['Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg']
Scenario: ['Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.']

Stars: ['Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox']
Scenario: ['A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.']

Stars: ['Keanu Reeves, Al Pacino, Charlize Theron, Jeffrey Jones']
Scenario: ['An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.']

Stars: ['Ben Stiller, Christine Taylor, Vince Vaughn, Rip Torn']
Scenario: ['A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.']

Stars: ['Monica Bellucci, Giuseppe Sulfaro, Luciano Federico, Matilde Piana']
Scenario: ['Amidst the war climate, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Malèna, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.']

Stars: ['Jane Levy, Shiloh Fernandez, Jessica Lucas, Lou Taylor Pucci']
Scenario: ['Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.']

Stars: ['Brad Pitt, Tommy Lee Jones, Ruth Negga, Donald Sutherland']
Scenario: ['Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe.']

Stars: ['Anna Faris, Regina Hall, Craig Bierko, Bill Pullman']
Scenario: ['Cindy finds out the house she lives in is haunted by a little boy and goes on a quest to find out who killed him and why. Also, Alien "Tr-iPods" are invading the world and she has to uncover the secret in order to stop them.']

Stars: ['Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Kate Mara']
Scenario: ['An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.']

Stars: ['Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving']
Scenario: ['Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.']

Stars: ['Kenneth Branagh, Penélope Cruz, Willem Dafoe, Judi Dench']
Scenario: ["When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case."]
